source: TEXT_LUCKHA301_03999_SEQ_00<tab>Francel, deep in thought, gazes intently at the streets of the Firmament.
target: TEXT_LUCKHA301_03999_SEQ_00<tab>Francel observe les passants avec intérêt.

source: TEXT_LUCKHA301_03999_SEQ_01<tab>Lord Francel rejoices upon seeing you approach, once more extending his profuse gratitude for all you have done to help him realize his vision of a Firmament fully reborn. Reflecting on the importance of culture, the arts, and entertainment and the role these all play in sustaining a living, breathing city, he invites you on a tour of the newly opened Risensong Quarter─a district which he hopes will serve precisely that role for the Firmament as a whole. Should you be so inclined as to take him up on his offer, join him at Ser Vaindreau's Grace.
target: TEXT_LUCKHA301_03999_SEQ_01<tab>Francel était ravi de vous revoir, mais peut-être plus encore ravi de savoir Azurée entièrement reconstruite. Il vous a d'ailleurs proposé de vous faire faire le tour du Nouveau Refrain, le carrefour culturel du quartier. Rejoignez-le là-bas pour commencer votre visite.

source: TEXT_LUCKHA301_03999_SEQ_02<tab>You convene with Lord Francel at Ser Vaindreau's Grace, the Firmament's most impressive new infirmary. Here, as your good friend tells it, any and all people in Ishgard may seek succor and reprieve from their wounds and ailments regardless of their status or station. Your conversation is interrupted by an artist whom you recognize as something of a celebrity in these parts. Gushing with adoration, he thanks you profusely for your role in ending the war, which allowed him to put down his blade in favor of the brush and palette he had dreamed of taking in hand for so long. Thanking him for the sentiment, you make ready to join Francel at the next destination on your excursion─the bathhouses of Snowsoak Springs.
target: TEXT_LUCKHA301_03999_SEQ_02<tab>Francel vous a présenté la maison de repos Rouchemande, un lieu ouvert à tous les patients en convalescence qui souhaitent récupérer au calme. Un peintre que vous avez souvent croisé dans le quartier vous a alors interpellé<var 08 E905 ((e)) (()) /var> pour vous remercier personnellement pour votre aide lors de la recon<var 16 /var>struc<var 16 /var>tion. Ce philanthrope vous a invité<var 08 E905 ((e)) (()) /var> à admirer les toiles qu'il a offertes à l'éta<var 16 /var>blis<var 16 /var>se<var 16 /var>ment de soins avant de vous quitter, puis Francel a proposé de vous rendre ensuite aux Bains floconneux. Rejoignez-le là-bas.

source: TEXT_LUCKHA301_03999_SEQ_03<tab>Admiring the elegant architecture and steaming thermal baths of Snowsoak Springs, your conversation with Francel is interrupted by a couple of familiar faces─itinerant artisans who worked alongside you in the reconstruction effort. Though pleased at a job well done, they lament that the completion of the reconstruction effort means that they must now go separate ways with their beloved chief who was a stern-yet-gentle guiding hand throughout the long process. Speaking from your own experience traveling the realm, you assure them that farewell need not be forever, a sentiment which heartens them somewhat. Your work here done, you set off to rejoin Francel where you started, in the center of the Risensong Quarter.
target: TEXT_LUCKHA301_03999_SEQ_03<tab>Les Bains floconneux n'était pas vides lorsque vous êtes arrivés. Vous avez facilité les adieux déchirants de disciples ishgardais à leurs maîtres, et vous vous dirigez maintenant vers la dernière étape de votre tour du centre culturel d'Azurée. Retrouvez Francel sur la place centrale du Nouveau Refrain.

source: TEXT_LUCKHA301_03999_SEQ_04<tab>Standing at the center of the newly opened quarter with Lord Francel, you survey your surroundings and marvel at how remarkably this place has flourished in such a short time. Your reverie is interrupted by the arrival of Conon, a former acquaintance who has recovered from his wounds to be up on his feet once more. After thanking you for introducing him to Marcelloix and his marvelous remedies, he asks if he might trouble you for your advice on a matter of concern. With Francel returning to see to various administrative affairs, you elect to entertain the young man's offer to see if there is aught aid you might lend him.
target: TEXT_LUCKHA301_03999_SEQ_04<tab>Vous et Francel avez croisé Conon dont l'opinion sur les dragons a bien changé depuis votre première rencontre. Il vous a à nouveau remercié<var 08 E905 ((e)) (()) /var> et vous a fait savoir qu'il aurait un petit service à vous demander. Adressez-lui la parole lorsque vous aurez un peu de temps à lui consacrer.

source: TEXT_LUCKHA301_03999_SEQ_05<tab>
target: TEXT_LUCKHA301_03999_SEQ_05<tab>

target: TEXT_LUCKHA301_03999_TODO_00<tab>Retrouver Francel, devant la maison de repos Rouchemande

source: TEXT_LUCKHA301_03999_TODO_01<tab>Speak with Francel once more.
target: TEXT_LUCKHA301_03999_TODO_01<tab>Retrouver Francel aux Bains floconneux

source: TEXT_LUCKHA301_03999_FRANCEL_000_000<tab>Ah, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>! 'Tis always a pleasure to see you here in the Firmament. I'm certain you'll agree that the place is feeling livelier and more cultured than ever, is it not?
target: TEXT_LUCKHA301_03999_FRANCEL_000_000<tab><var 08 E3E90C0D ((<var 08 E3E90C05 ((Bonsoir)) ((Bonjour)) /var>)) ((<var 08 E3E90C12 ((Bonjour)) ((Bonsoir)) /var>)) /var>, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var><var 1D /var>! De plus en plus de gens emménagent dans le secteur résidentiel, et les échoppes fleurissent dans le secteur commerçant. La métamorphose d'Azurée est spectaculaire<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_LUCKHA301_03999_FRANCEL_000_001<tab>Truly, we could have never hoped to accomplish this without the help of our preeminent skybuilder. Truly, I have not the words to express the depths of my gratitude!
target: TEXT_LUCKHA301_03999_FRANCEL_000_001<tab>Je ne saurais comment vous remercier pour le rôle que vous avez joué dans son essor<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_LUCKHA301_03999_FRANCEL_000_002<tab>Recently, I have had occasion to take the briefest of respites from my daily duties and reflect upon the reconstruction effort as a whole. And in doing so, my mind oft returns to Emmanellain's words that day.
target: TEXT_LUCKHA301_03999_FRANCEL_000_002<tab>Avant que vous n'arriviez, je réfléchissais à ce que m'avait dit sire Emmanellain au début des travaux. Lui s'imaginait Azurée comme un quartier divertissant, où les gens pourraient passer du bon temps dans la joie et la bonne humeur.

source: TEXT_LUCKHA301_03999_FRANCEL_000_003<tab>An ever-growing number of Ishgardians now make their residence in the Firmament, and its markets bustle with customers and exotic wares from across the realm. What more could be needed? The answer was clear─a place where those who live and ply their trade here can leave behind their worries and cares, and indulge in the finer pleasures of life.
target: TEXT_LUCKHA301_03999_FRANCEL_000_003<tab>Je ne veux pas trop m'avancer, mais je pense que Le Nouveau Refrain répondra par<var 16 /var>fai<var 16 /var>te<var 16 /var>ment à ses attentes<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_LUCKHA301_03999_FRANCEL_000_004<tab>Yes, the newly completed Risensong Quarter shall be precisely that. And I would like nothing more than for you to be the first to walk its streets with me...if, of course, you have no more pressing commitments at the moment?
target: TEXT_LUCKHA301_03999_FRANCEL_000_004<tab>Je m'y rendais justement. Permettez-moi de vous faire visiter ce chaleureux endroit, je vous dois bien ça après l'aide que vous avez apportée lors des travaux de Tombeplume.

source: TEXT_LUCKHA301_03999_FRANCEL_000_005<tab>Splendid! Then let us first make for Ser Vaindreau's Grace. I think that you, too, will be keen to lay your eyes on a location which I believe to be the pride of the Firmament.
target: TEXT_LUCKHA301_03999_FRANCEL_000_005<tab>Commençons par la maison de repos Rouchemande. Je tiens à m'assurer que les patients qui y séjournent ont tout ce dont ils ont besoin.

source: TEXT_LUCKHA301_03999_FONCRINEAU_100_010<tab><var 08 E905 ((Mistress)) ((Master)) /var> <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>. We are forever in your debt. Has Lord Francel shown you about the Risensong Quarter yet, pray tell?
target: TEXT_LUCKHA301_03999_FONCRINEAU_100_010<tab>Avez-vous eu l'occasion de visiter Le Nouveau Refrain depuis la fin des travaux, <var 08 E905 ((Madame)) ((Messire)) /var> <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var><var 1D /var>?

source: TEXT_LUCKHA301_03999_FONCRINEAU_000_010<tab>I am filled with the utmost sense of pride and satisfaction seeing Lord Francel's dream come to fruition as it has. Pray take in the Firmament to the fullest, <var 08 E905 ((Mistress)) ((Master)) /var> <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>─for you have played as much a role in this as any.
target: TEXT_LUCKHA301_03999_FONCRINEAU_000_010<tab>Vous partagez à coup sûr mon enthousiasme de voir Azurée à nouveau embellie. Je vous recommande d'en faire le tour.

source: TEXT_LUCKHA301_03999_FRANCEL_000_020<tab>I do hope our presence won't be a bother...
target: TEXT_LUCKHA301_03999_FRANCEL_000_020<tab>J'ose à peine entrer. Nous risquons peut-être de déranger...

source: TEXT_LUCKHA301_03999_FRANCEL_000_021<tab>...Ah, forgive me. The building before us I have dubbed Ser Vaindreau's Grace. It is a place where the ailing and injured might see their wounds or maladies tended to.
target: TEXT_LUCKHA301_03999_FRANCEL_000_021<tab>Vous connaissez l'hôpital du palais de l'ordre du Temple, je présume. La maison de repos Rouchemande a été bâtie dans le but de recevoir ses malades en voie de guérison. Ils peuvent ainsi récupérer au calme.

source: TEXT_LUCKHA301_03999_FRANCEL_000_022<tab>Some of our patients require only the briefest of treatment before they are back on their feet again, while those with more serious conditions might stay in these halls for months. There are even those here suffering from troubling sicknesses not visible to the eye─but our healers do their best to provide succor just the same.
target: TEXT_LUCKHA301_03999_FRANCEL_000_022<tab>Je dis en voie de guérison, mais elle accueille aussi les patients qui ont besoin d'une légère cure ou de rééducation à long terme. Après tout, une blessure fait bien plus que laisser sa marque dans la chair, et nous devons soigner ces cicatrices invisibles avec autant de diligence.

source: TEXT_LUCKHA301_03999_FRANCEL_000_023<tab>The construction of the facility was first proposed by the House of Commons, but the plan was met with immediate and overwhelming approval in the House of Lords, as well. How heartening it is to see our nation come together for a worthy cause.
target: TEXT_LUCKHA301_03999_FRANCEL_000_023<tab>C'est la Chambre du Peuple qui a proposé la con<var 16 /var>struc<var 16 /var>tion de cet éta<var 16 /var>blis<var 16 /var>se<var 16 /var>ment public, et vous serez ravi<var 08 E905 ((e)) (()) /var> d'apprendre que les nobles ont en grande majorité soutenu le projet.

source: TEXT_LUCKHA301_03999_FRANCEL_000_024<tab>Needless to say, be they commoner or noble, in these halls all patients receive the attention and care they deserve. Nor do we turn away any who seek employment here, regardless of their background or station.
target: TEXT_LUCKHA301_03999_FRANCEL_000_024<tab>Il est bien évidemment ouvert à tous<var 1D /var>; nul ne viendra contester l'extraction de ses patients ou de son personnel hospitalier. En outre, il se veut uni<var 16 /var>ver<var 16 /var>si<var 16 /var>tai<var 16 /var>re, et accepte quiconque désire étudier la médecine, même les plus jeunes.

source: TEXT_LUCKHA301_03999_ARTIST03999_000_025<tab>(-???-)Beg pardon, <var 08 E905 ((milord...milady)) ((milords)) /var>. If I might trouble you for a moment...
target: TEXT_LUCKHA301_03999_ARTIST03999_000_025<tab>(-???-)Excusez-moi, pourrais-je vous importuner un instant<var 1D /var>?

source: TEXT_LUCKHA301_03999_ARTIST03999_000_026<tab>I am but a humble artist working to capture the reconstruction of the Firmament on canvas for posterity. I saw the two of you here, and simply could not walk by without expressing my gratitude.
target: TEXT_LUCKHA301_03999_ARTIST03999_000_026<tab>J'ai peint toutes les étapes des travaux d'Azurée jusqu'à aujourd'hui, et j'ai plus d'une fois pu observer notre <var 08 E905 ((chère héroïne)) ((cher héros)) /var> vaquer sans faillir à la tâche. Permettez-moi de profiter de l'occasion pour lui adresser mes plus sincères re<var 16 /var>mer<var 16 /var>cie<var 16 /var>ments pour les services rendus à notre belle Cité.

source: TEXT_LUCKHA301_03999_FRANCEL_000_027<tab>Ah...but yes! I do believe I have had the pleasure of looking upon your paintings. You have our thanks as well for your most exquisite─ Wait. Why does your face look so familiar?
target: TEXT_LUCKHA301_03999_FRANCEL_000_027<tab>Je vous ai moi-même aperçu plusieurs fois le pinceau à la main. C'est que vos peintures attirent le regard, et... Tiens<var 1D /var>?

source: TEXT_LUCKHA301_03999_FRANCEL_000_028<tab>You are of House Chevraudan, are you not?
target: TEXT_LUCKHA301_03999_FRANCEL_000_028<tab>Pardonnez-moi si je me trompe, mais n'appartiendriez-vous pas à la famille Chevraudan<var 1D /var>?

source: TEXT_LUCKHA301_03999_ARTIST03999_000_029<tab>You are gracious indeed, my lord, to remember one of such humble blood. It is true─I once had the honor of paying my respects to you when introduced by Ser Adelphel at a banquet.
target: TEXT_LUCKHA301_03999_ARTIST03999_000_029<tab>Je suis flatté qu'on se souvienne d'un noble de bas rang comme moi, issu d'une branche cadette, qui plus est. Vous avez vu juste, Sire Francel, nous avons été présentés par Adelphel lors d'une réception mondaine.

source: TEXT_LUCKHA301_03999_ARTIST03999_100_029<tab>And you, of course, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>. There is no greater honor than to see you before me.
target: TEXT_LUCKHA301_03999_ARTIST03999_100_029<tab><var 08 E905 ((Madame)) ((Messire)) /var> <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 03 /var>...

source: TEXT_LUCKHA301_03999_ARTIST03999_000_030<tab>'Twas always my dream to become an artist. To capture the world around me in all its beauty, all its sadness, on my easel─that future generations may never forget the time we lived in. And yet, in times of war, there was of course no time for such lofty pursuits.
target: TEXT_LUCKHA301_03999_ARTIST03999_000_030<tab>J'ai toujours eu un penchant pour la peinture. Mal<var 16 /var>heu<var 16 /var>reu<var 16 /var>se<var 16 /var>ment, la guerre contre les dragons laissait peu de temps aux loisirs, et la peur au ventre, j'ai consacré tout mon temps aux combats lors de cette sombre période pour ma patrie.

source: TEXT_LUCKHA301_03999_ARTIST03999_000_031<tab>And so I donned my armor and took up my blade, resigned to the thought that I would one day fall in the unending battle against the Horde. Oh, how my heart sung the day you felled dread Nidhogg, ushering in a new dawn for our great nation!
target: TEXT_LUCKHA301_03999_ARTIST03999_000_031<tab>Je n'oublierai jamais le jour où vous avez marqué la fin de ce conflit en terrassant le dragon maléfique. Pour moi, c'était comme si le blizzard qui était sur le point de m'emporter se levait enfin, pour laisser place à un resplendissant ciel de printemps tacheté de flocons duveteux.

source: TEXT_LUCKHA301_03999_ARTIST03999_000_032<tab>At long last, I am able to lay down the weapons of war and take up my brush as I had dreamed of for all those years! Truly, it would not be an understatement to say that your heroism inspires every stroke that I paint.
target: TEXT_LUCKHA301_03999_ARTIST03999_000_032<tab>C'est grâce à vous que j'ai pu m'armer d'un nuancier plutôt que d'acier. Grâce à vous que je suis devenu l'homme que j'ai toujours voulu être. Et pour cela, je vous remercie du fond du cœur.

source: TEXT_LUCKHA301_03999_ARTIST03999_000_033<tab>...Ahem, forgive me. Moreover, I am proud to say that my work has been put on display right here in the halls of Ser Vaindreau's Grace.
target: TEXT_LUCKHA301_03999_ARTIST03999_000_033<tab>Certaines de mes toiles décorent les murs de cet éta<var 16 /var>blis<var 16 /var>se<var 16 /var>ment, si cela vous intéresse.

source: TEXT_LUCKHA301_03999_ARTIST03999_100_033<tab>Not to be overly presumptuous, but I feel there is a role for fine art to play in bringing succor to the hearts of the suffering. To that end, I have also made an effort to teach my craft to all who would learn...
target: TEXT_LUCKHA301_03999_ARTIST03999_100_033<tab>Je ne prétendrai pas qu'elles apportent du réconfort aux patients, mais je vous avoue que je serais bien heureux si elles pouvaient accélérer ne serait-ce qu'un peu leur convalescence.

source: TEXT_LUCKHA301_03999_DEALER03999_000_034<tab>Ah, there you are! I was hoping to inquire about the price of your latest masterpiece...
target: TEXT_LUCKHA301_03999_DEALER03999_000_034<tab>Maître<var 1D /var>! Je vous ai cherché partout<var 1D /var>! J'ai trouvé plusieurs acheteurs pour vos œuvres<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_LUCKHA301_03999_DEALER03999_000_035<tab>...Oh, pray forgive me! Clearly, you have more important matters to deal with. I meant not to intrude...
target: TEXT_LUCKHA301_03999_DEALER03999_000_035<tab>Ah... V-veuillez me pardonner<var 1D /var>! Je n'avais pas vu que vous étiez en pleine con<var 16 /var>ver<var 16 /var>sa<var 16 /var>tion<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_LUCKHA301_03999_ARTIST03999_000_036<tab>No apology needed, my good man. On the contrary, I have imposed upon my illustrious friends for far too long already.
target: TEXT_LUCKHA301_03999_ARTIST03999_000_036<tab>Inutile de vous confondre en excuses. Elle touchait à sa fin.

source: TEXT_LUCKHA301_03999_ARTIST03999_000_037<tab>And with that, I shall take my leave. Thank you for giving this humble artist the opportunity to express his appreciation in person. Whenever you see one of my works, know that they would never have been possible were it not for you.
target: TEXT_LUCKHA301_03999_ARTIST03999_000_037<tab>Je suis ravi d'avoir pu vous présenter mes re<var 16 /var>mer<var 16 /var>cie<var 16 /var>ments, <var 08 E905 ((Madame)) ((Messire)) /var> <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 03 /var>. Sur ce, permettez-moi de prendre congé.

source: TEXT_LUCKHA301_03999_FRANCEL_000_038<tab>Be proud, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>. Truly, you have made your mark on our nation and its people in more ways than one.
target: TEXT_LUCKHA301_03999_FRANCEL_000_038<tab>La paix a décidément du bon.

source: TEXT_LUCKHA301_03999_FRANCEL_000_039<tab>Now, shall we make for the next stop on our little tour? To Snowsoak Springs we go!
target: TEXT_LUCKHA301_03999_FRANCEL_000_039<tab>Et si nous nous dirigions vers Les Bains floconneux<var 1D /var>? Vous m'en direz des nouvelles<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_LUCKHA301_03999_FRANCEL_000_050<tab>I welcome you to Snowsoak Springs, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>. The waters here are natural thermal springs extracted from subterranean veins beneath Coerthas.
target: TEXT_LUCKHA301_03999_FRANCEL_000_050<tab>Regardez ça, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var><var 1D /var>! Ces bains sont alimentés par les sources du Coerthas<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_LUCKHA301_03999_FRANCEL_000_051<tab>We see to it that an ideal temperature for bathing is preserved by means of the finest fire crystals, procured directly from the Dravanian highlands. Needless to say, the springs are open to one and─
target: TEXT_LUCKHA301_03999_FRANCEL_000_051<tab>Nous chauffons l'eau grâce à des cristaux de feu issus du commerce avec l'Avant-pays dravanien<var 1D /var>! N'importe qui peut y faire ses ablutions, d'ailleurs je...

source: TEXT_LUCKHA301_03999_DISCIPLED03999_000_052<tab>(-???-)Chief! Miss! Don't leave us here alone! I beg of you!
target: TEXT_LUCKHA301_03999_DISCIPLED03999_000_052<tab>(-???-)CHEEEEFS<var 1D /var>!!! On vous en suppliiiie, partez paaaahaahaahaaaas<var 1D /var>!!!

source: TEXT_LUCKHA301_03999_ARTISANA03999_000_053<tab>Quit your whining, already. You know that we can't very well stay here forever.
target: TEXT_LUCKHA301_03999_ARTISANA03999_000_053<tab>Vous êtes bien gentils, les gars, mais on a notre prochain chantier qui nous attend...

source: TEXT_LUCKHA301_03999_ARTISANA03999_000_054<tab>Well, if it isn't Lord Francel and his star skybuilder. Perhaps you could talk some sense into this fellow.
target: TEXT_LUCKHA301_03999_ARTISANA03999_000_054<tab>Ah<var 1D /var>! Sire Francel, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>, vous tombez bien<var 1D /var>! Vous allez pouvoir leur expliquer<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_LUCKHA301_03999_ARTISANB03999_000_055<tab>As you well know, we are itinerant artisans, plying our trade all across the realm. When we finish one task, we must move on to the next. We'd a mind to celebrate a job well done here before heading to Limsa for our next assignment, but─
target: TEXT_LUCKHA301_03999_ARTISANB03999_000_055<tab>Heuuum... V-vous comprenez, la recon<var 16 /var>struc<var 16 /var>tion d'Azurée touche à sa fin, et nous devons rentrer à Limsa Lominsa. On pensait donc organiser un petit pot de départ, dans la joie et la bonne humeur, vous savez...

source: TEXT_LUCKHA301_03999_DISCIPLEB03999_000_056<tab>I simply can't bear to see the chief here go! Why, without them who will set me right when my hammering technique falters? Who will scold me when I am tempted to slack off on my duties!?
target: TEXT_LUCKHA301_03999_DISCIPLEB03999_000_056<tab>Mais on n'est bons à rien sans vous<var 1D /var>! Et puis, vous allez nous manquer<var 1D /var>! (snif)...

source: TEXT_LUCKHA301_03999_ARTISANB03999_000_057<tab>As you can see, this fellow simply refuses to let us go. Would you be so kind as to have a word with him on our behalf?
target: TEXT_LUCKHA301_03999_ARTISANB03999_000_057<tab>Bref, vous voyez le souci... C'est toujours triste les au revoir, mais faut pas exagérer.

source: TEXT_LUCKHA301_03999_Q1_000_000<tab>What will you say?
target: TEXT_LUCKHA301_03999_Q1_000_000<tab>Que dites-vous<var 1D /var>?

source: TEXT_LUCKHA301_03999_A1_000_001<tab>All good things must come to an end.
target: TEXT_LUCKHA301_03999_A1_000_001<tab>Rencontres et adieux vont de pair, vous savez<var 1D /var>?

source: TEXT_LUCKHA301_03999_A1_000_002<tab>You have a job to do.
target: TEXT_LUCKHA301_03999_A1_000_002<tab>Le travail passe avant tout.

source: TEXT_LUCKHA301_03999_A1_000_003<tab>This need not be good-bye.
target: TEXT_LUCKHA301_03999_A1_000_003<tab>Rien ne vous empêche de leur rendre visite plus tard.

source: TEXT_LUCKHA301_03999_DISCIPLED03999_000_058<tab>I know this, and yet... I simply owe so much to the chief for all she has taught me. I fear that I will not be able to live up to her expectations in her absence. And yet, I suppose you are right...I must soldier on somehow.
target: TEXT_LUCKHA301_03999_DISCIPLED03999_000_058<tab>On comprend, on comprend... C'est juste qu'on leur doit tellement<var 1D /var>! Du coup, ça nous fait mal au cœur...

source: TEXT_LUCKHA301_03999_DISCIPLED03999_000_059<tab>You mean I can─ Why, yes! I can meet her again! Our borders are open now, and Ser Aymeric himself encourages free travel between our nations! Should I wish to pay my regards to the chief, I am free to travel to Limsa any time I like!
target: TEXT_LUCKHA301_03999_DISCIPLED03999_000_059<tab>... Hé mais... C'est vrai ça<var 1D /var>! J'y avais pas pensé, mais avec sire Aymeric qui encourage la reprise des échanges avec les pays étrangers, on devrait pouvoir voyager facilement<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_LUCKHA301_03999_ARTISANA03999_000_060<tab>It's just as the savior of Ishgard here says. So stand up straight and quit your whinging for once!
target: TEXT_LUCKHA301_03999_ARTISANA03999_000_060<tab>Vous avez entendu <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var><var 1D /var>!? Alors maintenant, arrêtez de me tirer ces tronches de trois fulms de long, OK<var 1D /var>!?

source: TEXT_LUCKHA301_03999_ARTISANA03999_000_061<tab>That goes for the whole lot of you! You all had─and'll continue to have─a hand in one of the impressive rebuilding efforts this realm has ever seen. So take some damn pride in your work, that the Firmament might soar to even greater heights!
target: TEXT_LUCKHA301_03999_ARTISANA03999_000_061<tab>Vous êtes des pros désormais<var 1D /var>! Alors balayez-moi ces doutes et affichez un peu de fierté pour votre travail, nom d'un bombo<var 1D /var>! Azurée va encore avoir besoin de vous quand on sera parties, me décevez pas<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_LUCKHA301_03999_DISCIPLED03999_000_062<tab>(-Apprentices-)Aye aye, Chief!
target: TEXT_LUCKHA301_03999_DISCIPLED03999_000_062<tab>(-Les apprentis-)OUI, CHEEEEEEFS<var 1D /var>!!!

source: TEXT_LUCKHA301_03999_FRANCEL_000_063<tab>Well, that was a rather...unexpected distraction. Still, all's well that ends well, I suppose.
target: TEXT_LUCKHA301_03999_FRANCEL_000_063<tab>Une crise résolue de plus. Laissons-les profiter de ce dernier moment ensemble.

source: TEXT_LUCKHA301_03999_FRANCEL_000_064<tab>And with that, I do believe we should be on our way. Pray accompany me to the main plaza of the Risensong Quarter, would you?
target: TEXT_LUCKHA301_03999_FRANCEL_000_064<tab>J'ai gardé le meilleur pour la fin. Rendons-nous sur la place centrale du Nouveau Refrain.

source: TEXT_LUCKHA301_03999_FRANCEL_000_070<tab>As you can see, this is the district's main thoroughfare, connecting the Pillars above with the Brume below. I oft walk the streets here to speak to passersby and see if there is aught with which I might assist them.
target: TEXT_LUCKHA301_03999_FRANCEL_000_070<tab>Cette avenue constitue aussi un passage entre Azurée et Les Contreforts d'Ishgard. Je profite souvent de cette affluence pour demander aux gens s'ils font face à des difficultés quelconques au quotidien. Aujourd'hui, tout le monde m'a l'air d'avoir le sourire.

source: TEXT_LUCKHA301_03999_FRANCEL_000_071<tab>And with that, I do believe you've seen most everything the quarter has to offer. What say you, my friend? Did it live up to your expectations?
target: TEXT_LUCKHA301_03999_FRANCEL_000_071<tab>Qu'en dites-vous, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var><var 1D /var>? Avez-vous pu vous imprégner de l'atmosphère de détente qui règne au sein de notre carrefour culturel<var 1D /var>?

source: TEXT_LUCKHA301_03999_CONON_000_072<tab>(-Familiar Face-)If it isn't the savior of Ishgard─and Lord Francel, as well! Foncrineau said I might find the two of you here, and thank the heavens that I have!
target: TEXT_LUCKHA301_03999_CONON_000_072<tab>(-Habitant d'Azurée au visage familier-)Sire Francel<var 1D /var>! Foncrineau m'a dit que je pourrais vous trouver ici.

source: TEXT_LUCKHA301_03999_FRANCEL_000_073<tab>Conon! 'Tis good to see you up and about again. I trust your wounds have healed?
target: TEXT_LUCKHA301_03999_FRANCEL_000_073<tab>Conon<var 1D /var>! Vous souffriez encore la dernière fois que nous nous sommes vus. Comment vont vos blessures<var 1D /var>?

source: TEXT_LUCKHA301_03999_CONON_000_074<tab>Indeed they have. Thanks to Marcelloix and his most marvelous unguent, I can scarcely feel a thing!
target: TEXT_LUCKHA301_03999_CONON_000_074<tab>Mieux, beaucoup mieux. L'onguent que m'a préparé Marcelloix a fait des miracles. Je ne ressens presque plus aucune douleur.

source: TEXT_LUCKHA301_03999_CONON_000_075<tab>And to think that were it not for the both of you, I never would have even given the poor man a chance. I simply had to express my gratitude in person─and yet, my words seem so woefully inadequate when measured against the profundity of your deeds.
target: TEXT_LUCKHA301_03999_CONON_000_075<tab>C'est d'ailleurs la raison de ma présence aujourd'hui, <var 08 E905 ((Madame)) ((Messire)) /var> <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 03 /var>. Sans vous et sire Francel, j'aurais continué de me méprendre au sujet de Marcelloix en particulier, et des dragons en général. Vous m'avez ouvert les yeux, et je tenais à vous en remercier.

source: TEXT_LUCKHA301_03999_CONON_000_076<tab>Though, truth be told, there is one more matter regarding which I would seek your counsel... Might you allow me to impose upon you for just a bit longer?
target: TEXT_LUCKHA301_03999_CONON_000_076<tab>Je voulais aussi m'entretenir d'autre chose avec vous, mais... je ne saurais abuser de votre temps ou de votre gentillesse. Je resterai dans les parages un moment. Venez me voir plus tard si vous n'êtes pas trop pressé<var 08 E905 ((e)) (()) /var>, et je vous expliquerai de quoi il retourne.

source: TEXT_LUCKHA301_03999_FRANCEL_000_77<tab>Sometimes it seems as if you are in greater demand in the Firmament than I, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>. Small wonder, given all that you have done for the people here.
target: TEXT_LUCKHA301_03999_FRANCEL_000_77<tab>Les habitants se confient na<var 16 /var>tu<var 16 /var>rel<var 16 /var>le<var 16 /var>ment à vous. Preuve, s'il en est, qu'Azurée n'aurait pas vu le jour sous les mêmes auspices sans votre aide.

source: TEXT_LUCKHA301_03999_FRANCEL_000_078<tab>And on that note, there are many administrative duties that await my attention, and I had best be returning to them sooner rather than later. Till next time, my friends!
target: TEXT_LUCKHA301_03999_FRANCEL_000_078<tab>Permettez-moi de prendre congé, à présent. Voilà une éternité que je ne suis pas rentré au manoir, et je suis certain qu'une montagne de paperasse et d'obligations m'y attend. Au plaisir, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>.
